root.output

Class KeyAsValueSequenceFileRecordReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • root.output.KeyAsValueSequenceFileRecordReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.mapred.RecordReader<org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text>

    public class KeyAsValueSequenceFileRecordReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.hadoop.mapred.RecordReader<org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text>

    This Sequence File Record Reader allows the reading of an input file formatted where the key is effectively ignored and all data is stored in the value.

    Since:
    2013.06.25
    Author:
    Dillon Rose, Michel Rouly
